actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service under the civil service retirement system periods of service as contract technicians by persons hired by private authority to perform work under Federal supervision pursuant to a contract between such private authority and the Federal Government, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the inclusion as creditable service under the civil service retirement system periods of service as contract technicians by persons hired by private authority to perform work under Federal supervision pursuant to a contract between such private authority and the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include as creditable service under the civil service retirement system periods of service as contract technicians by persons hired by private authority to perform work under Federal supervision pursuant to a contract between such private authority and the Federal Government, and for other purposes.
